
### 2-level exercise (3)  {.smaller}


::: {style="font-size: 70%"}

9-bit virtual addresses, 6-bit physical; 8 byte pages, 1 byte PTE<br/>
page tables 1 page; PTE: 3 bit PPN (MSB), 1 valid bit, 4 unused<br/>
page table base register <code>0x08</code>; translate virtual address <code>0x00B</code>

:::
